title: An Introduction to Zed AI and How It Compares to Cursor AI
author: David Eastman
description: Like Cursor, Zed AI integrates large language models into an impressive code editor. We take Zed AI for a spin and compare it to Cursor.
cntitle: Zed AI 简介及其与 Cursor AI 的比较
cndescription: 与 Cursor 类似，Zed AI 将大型语言模型集成到一个令人印象深刻的代码编辑器中。我们试用了 Zed AI 并将其与 Cursor 进行了比较。
